segments.text: I notice a young boy climbing on a stool, reaching for the cookie jar.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: He seems determined, but the way the stool wobbles has me feeling uneasy.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: What if he falls? It’s such a risky move, and I can see he’s close to tipping over.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: There’s a girl nearby, her arm raised in anticipation, waiting for her sweet reward.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I think about how these two are plotting their little cookie heist right under the woman’s nose.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: It’s almost comical how innocent they look in their mischief, yet it’s so dangerous.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I can’t decide whether to be amused or worried about their antics.
segments.speaker: PAR
